hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
if [ -d $WORKSPACE/MobileProvisioningService ]; then /bin/rm -rf $WORKSPACE/MobileProvisioningService fi
git clone git@github.gwd.broadcom.net:ESD/MobileProvisioningService.git
echo "workspace is $WORKSPACE"
cd $WORKSPACE/MobileProvisioningService/config/
ENABLED=`cat NA_Feature_Flag.config |grep enabled`
echo "enabled is $ENABLED"
if [ X"$ENABLED" == "X" ]; then sed -i 's/enable/enabled/g' NA_Feature_Flag.config else sed -i 's/enabled/enable/g' NA_Feature_Flag.config fi
cd $WORKSPACE/MobileProvisioningService/caapm-performance-comparator/properties
MOD=$(($BUILD_NUMBER%4))
echo "MOD is $MOD"
if [ $MOD -eq 0 ]; then sed -i 's/build.fail=false/build.fail=true/g' performance-comparator.properties else sed -i 's/build.fail=true/build.fail=false/g' performance-comparator.properties fi
cd $WORKSPACE/MobileProvisioningService/
if [ $MOD -eq 0 ]; then sed -i 's/#sh \"kubectl/\/\/sh \"kubectl/g' Jenkinsfile else sed -i 's/sh \"kubectl/\/\/sh \"kubectl/g' Jenkinsfile fi
git config --global user.email "you@example.com" git config --global user.name "Your Name"
git add $WORKSPACE/MobileProvisioningService/config/NA_Feature_Flag.config $WORKSPACE/MobileProvisioningService/caapm-performance-comparator/properties/performance-comparator.properties $WORKSPACE/MobileProvisioningService/Jenkinsfile
git commit -m "North America 5G provisioning Feature Flag Enabled"
git push origin master
